title: Enhancing AI Practical Competencies: Reflective Practice-Based Video Self-Analysis for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogical knowledge and instructional design experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can identify at least three strengths and areas for improvement in their teaching behaviors by analyzing their own lesson videos
Develop at least two reflective practice strategies by combining peer feedback and self-assessment
Systematically connect the lesson design-execution-evaluation process through intentional video material collection
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
